name: Magnetic Pinball
description:
Controls

 Flippers :   [<-]    [->]
Spend Credit : [Space]




New Ball
Enter three time in the canon and you will be rewarded with a new ball.


Multiplier
Activating the 3 exits will grant you a x3 multiplier for 35 seconds


Magnet Boost
This path will boost the magnetic field around the bumpers for 10 seconds. During the Magnet Boost, the point value of every bumpers is increased by 5 after every hit until the end of the event.
Having multiple balls inside the magnetic field during this event and reactivating it before it ends are the best ways to make a high score !




This game has been made in 48h, it is my submission to the ScoreSpace Jam #18.
